testcase.name: To Validate the search page in adactinhotelapp
testcase.system-out: Given User is in adactinhotelapp login page.................................passed When user enter valid "Ezhilpraga" and "XGHXR5".............................passed And user click login button.................................................passed And user select and enters location,hotel,room type,number of rooms,"26/06/2021","<check out date>",adults per room,children per room..passed And user click search button................................................passed And user click the radio button.............................................passed And user click continue button..............................................passed And user book the hotel by entering the details "Ezhil","Maha","chennai","1234657890123456","123",creditcardtype,month,year.passed And user click book now button..............................................passed Then user must be in select page............................................passed And user must be in booking hotel page......................................passed And user will get order id..................................................passed
